languages.text: "Однако, Вольный Торговец, меж нами остался еще один нерешенный вопрос. Как мы уже говорили ранее, дитя должно вернуться в лоно Дома. Не откажите в любезности дать на то согласие".

traits.locale_text: "Однако, Вольный Торговец, меж нами остался еще один нерешенный вопрос. Как мы уже говорили ранее, дитя должно вернуться в лоно Дома. Не откажите в любезности дать на то согласие".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "And yet there is still one matter we need to discuss, Rogue Trader. As we said earlier, the child must return to the fold of her House. We hope you will be gracious enough to acquiesce."
languages.original_text: "Однако, Вольный Торговец, меж нами остался еще один нерешенный вопрос. Как мы уже говорили ранее, дитя должно вернуться в лоно Дома. Не откажите в любезности дать на то согласие".

traits.locale_text: "And yet there is still one matter we need to discuss, Rogue Trader. Like we said earlier, the child must return to her House's embrace. Would you be so kind as to agree?"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "And yet there is still one matter we need to discuss, Rogue Trader. Like we said earlier, the child must return to her House's embrace. Would you be so kind as to agree?"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "And yet there is still one matter we need to discuss, Rogue Trader. As we said earlier, the child must return to the fold of her House. We hope you will be gracious enough to acquiesce."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "And yet there is still one matter we need to discuss, Rogue Trader. As we said earlier, the child must return to the fold of her House. We hope you will be gracious enough to acquiesce."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "And yet there is still one matter we need to discuss, Rogue Trader. As we said earlier, the child must return to the fold of her House. We hope you will be gracious enough to acquiesce."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “不过，还有一件事情我们需要讨论，行商浪人。正如我们之前所言，这孩子必须返回她的家族。我们希望您能慷慨地答应这个条件。”
languages.original_text: "And yet there is still one matter we need to discuss, Rogue Trader. As we said earlier, the child must return to the fold of her House. We hope you will be gracious enough to acquiesce."

traits.locale_text: “不过，还有一件事情我们需要讨论，行商浪人。正如我们之前所言，这孩子必须返回她的家族。我们希望您能慷慨地答应这个条件。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «Aun así, queda un asunto del que hablar, Comerciante Independiente. Como ya hemos dicho, la niña debe volver al redil de su casa. Esperamos que lo permita amablemente».
languages.original_text: "And yet there is still one matter we need to discuss, Rogue Trader. As we said earlier, the child must return to the fold of her House. We hope you will be gracious enough to acquiesce."

traits.locale_text: «Aun así, queda un asunto del que hablar, Comerciante Independiente. Como ya hemos dicho, la niña debe volver al redil de su casa. Esperamos que lo permita amablemente».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「自由開拓者よ、まだ話し合うべきことがある。先程も言った通り、あの子は家門に戻らなければならないのだ。承諾していただけると幸いだ」
languages.original_text: "And yet there is still one matter we need to discuss, Rogue Trader. As we said earlier, the child must return to the fold of her House. We hope you will be gracious enough to acquiesce."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者よ、まだ話し合うべきことがある。先程も言った通り、あの子は家門に戻らなければならないのだ。承諾していただけると幸いだ」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Trotzdem müssen wir noch eine weitere Angelegenheit besprechen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Wie bereits gesagt, muss das Kind in sein Haus zurückkehren. Wir hoffen auf Eure Großzügigkeit, das zu erlauben."
languages.original_text: "And yet there is still one matter we need to discuss, Rogue Trader. As we said earlier, the child must return to the fold of her House. We hope you will be gracious enough to acquiesce."

traits.locale_text: "Trotzdem müssen wir noch eine weitere Angelegenheit besprechen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Wie bereits gesagt, muss das Kind in sein Haus zurückkehren. Wir hoffen auf Eure Großzügigkeit, das zu erlauben."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Il est encore un sujet dont nous devons discuter, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. L'Enfant doit revenir sous la tutelle de sa maison. Nous espérons que vous aurez la courtoisie de ne pas vous y opposer. »
languages.original_text: "And yet there is still one matter we need to discuss, Rogue Trader. As we said earlier, the child must return to the fold of her House. We hope you will be gracious enough to acquiesce."

traits.locale_text: « Il est encore un sujet dont nous devons discuter, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. L'enfant doit revenir sous la tutelle de sa maison. Nous espérons que vous aurez la courtoisie de ne pas vous y opposer. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Konuşmamız gereken bir konu daha var Hür Tacir. Daha önce de dediğimiz gibi çocuk, Hane ocağına dönmeli. Umarım karşı çıkmama lütfunu gösterirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "And yet there is still one matter we need to discuss, Rogue Trader. As we said earlier, the child must return to the fold of her House. We hope you will be gracious enough to acquiesce."

traits.locale_text: "Konuşmamız gereken bir konu daha var Hür Tacir. Daha önce de dediğimiz gibi, çocuk Hane ocağına geri dönmeli. Umarım karşı çıkmama lütfunu gösterirsiniz."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
